description: Build a production-ready Python CLI tool called `greet` that displays multilingual "Hello, World!" greetings in 10 languages (English, French, Spanish, German, Japanese, Mandarin, Arabic, Hindi, Swahili, Portuguese) with customizable ASCII art banners, terminal colors, animations, and fun modes. The tool must follow data-driven architecture principles where adding new languages requires only data entries, not logic changes, and must support extensive customization options including language filtering, personalization, cowsay bubbles, party mode with emoji confetti, grid layouts, and animated output modes.
title: greet-cli
